introduce.title: What is Relapse Translator
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Relapse Translator is a unique translation tool that captures the raw feelings and melancholic melodies in songs, transforming them into the lyrical essence of Relapse.

items.title: Sarah Johnson
items.label: Content Creator

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us for support.

items.title: How accurate are the translations?
items.description: Our AI-powered system provides highly accurate translations with natural language flow. We continuously improve our models for better results.

items.title: Which languages are supported?
items.description: Relapse Translator supports a wide range of languages, allowing you to experience emotional translations across different cultures.

items.title: Is my data secure?
items.description: Yes, we take data security seriously. All translations are encrypted and we never store your content permanently.

items.title: How can I use Relapse Translator?
items.description: Simply paste your text, select the target language, and let our AI transform it into the lyrical essence of Relapse.
